data.title: [Solved] Which of the following Indian states has a unicameral state
data.meta_description:
The correct answer is West Bengal.

Key Points


	West Bengal has a unicameral state legislature.
	A state legislature that has one house, known as Vi
data.text: Allahabad High Court Group C Final Result Out (2022-23 exam cycle)! The Allahabad High Court released a notification for the Allahabad High Court Group C Recruitment 2022. The recruitment will be done for posts like Stenographer in Hindi, Stenographer in English, Junior Assistant, and Driver. A total of 2233 vacancies are expected to be released for this year. Candidates who get selected under the Group C recruitment process will receive Allahabad High Court Group C Salary range between Rs. 5,200 to Rs. 20,200. Candidates must refer to the Allahabad High Court Group C Previous Year Papers and Allahabad High Court Group C Mock Test while preparing for the exam.
